## Subscriber type

Expresses interest in store value changes over time. It can be either: - a callback function: [SubscriberFunction](./ngx-tansu.subscriberfunction.md)<!-- -->; - a partial observer: [SubscriberObject](./ngx-tansu.subscriberobject.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Subscriber<T> = SubscriberFunction<T> | Partial<SubscriberObject<T>> | null | undefined;
```
<b>References:</b> [SubscriberFunction](./ngx-tansu.subscriberfunction.md)<!-- -->, [SubscriberObject](./ngx-tansu.subscriberobject.md)
